location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘Road map, present operation. Province of Hasa, Saudi Arabia. B-1132’

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:611 x 252 mm, on sheet 795 x 675 mm

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Relief shown by hachures. Depth shown by contours.Map of al-Hasa region in eastern Saudi Arabia, compiled by O.C. Olson for the California Arabian Standard Oil Company, Geological Division.Shows primary and secondary roads, camel routes and intermittent streams, with mountain ranges, water wells, native wells marked, area east of Ras El Khafqi [Khafji] incidated ‘neutral zone’.
